title: Things Parisians Say
subtitle: French proverbs explained
description: My French mates have been teaching me typical things Parisians say. Most of these things are not really on the radar of expats so I thought it would be fun to collect all of them on this page. I've tried my best to explain them as best I can. If the below explanations have errors or make no sense, please reply with your revision so I can update the page.
